title: Eyebrows Accelerator PERFECT BROWS Eyebrows Growth Balm & Enhancer for Fullness and Darkness NEW FORMULA enriched with Provitamin B5, Vit A & E
description: SAVE NOW! CHECK OUR VALUE PACK OF 2!Our Perfect Brows Growth Accelerator formula works to stimulate eyebrow hairs to grow by encouraging the skins micro-circulation processes on the treated areas. This is because healthy hair follicles need to rest up to 4 months before cells start dividing again and new hairs begin to grow. In other words, the density of your eyebrows depends on the amount of hair follicles strong enough to grow hair. One of the common issues with over-plucked eyebrows is that hair follicles are usually severally damaged and can take up to 6 months for hair strands to start growing back. PERFECT BROWS Growth Accelerator formula works to stimulate eyebrow hairs to grow, but it will still take at least 2 months to see new hair growth. When using any natural organic product like Perfect Brows Growth Accelerator formula, it's important to have realistic expectations that new brow hair growth will take time. Remember that it is physically impossible for new hair growth to occur in just a few days.One of the most common issues of new-grown brow hair is that they do not stay in place. Beeswax is the one of the key ingredient to make your eyebrows grow in the right direction naturally. Also, your existing eyebrow hair will look fuller. Beeswax acts as an emulsifier making the hair shaft look thicker, and it also brings shine by filling in the hair shaft surface, which provides elasticity.
